attributes.action: The Scottish Referendum - Stop the Horse-Trading
attributes.additional_details:
The British Government and the major political parties should not make any new promises to try to sway the result of the Scottish Referendum.
There is a strong belief that the Scots already receive beneficial treatment from the UK and that Scottish views are over-represented in the UK Parliament.
Whilst we believe that the Scots should stay further promises and offers show weakness and  are an unprincipled response which does not have electoral consent.
Let the Scots make their choice and then let the rest of us make ours.
